titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the setling of the letter office of England and Scotland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Bagshot, the last day of Iuly, in the eleuenth yeere of Our reigne. ...
Arms 23 (with C R at the top); Steele notation: enter- shall 2) said His.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and
